root.name: Students of the Round
root.description: OverviewStudents of the Round is a first-person dungeon crawling RPG in the vein of Wizardry. It was originally developed for the PC by Experience Inc., and released in Japan on April 23, 2010.The game has been ported to consoles twice. First a Xbox 360 port developed by Team Muramasa was released on February 10, 2011. Then a PSP port, named Students of the Round: The Eternal Legend, was released on October 11, 2012.Version DifferencesThe Xbox 360 port features the following key differences from the PC original:Xbox 360 Exclusive Event Scene ArtworkNew monstersNew itemsNew dungeonsNew background musicNew story segments featuring all new event visualsFirst print run of the game also includes a code that swaps out the normal artwork for super-deformed/chibi versions of the characters.The Xbox also recieved a demo on January 27th, which earns the player a present that unlocks in the full retail game upon completion.Spin-offWhile not a direct sequel, Experience's 2013 dungeon crawler Demon Gaze for the PlayStation Vita shares its setting with Students of the Round, taking place many years later.
